import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from '../course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course-list', templateUrl: './course-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course-list.component.css'] }) export class CourseListComponent implements OnInit{ courses: Course }
